description:
No menu options function, can't open preferences menu (needed to set account details to log in, etc.). Entirely non-functional.

The app on Zotero.org is 1 major version ahead and functional.
As per Richard M Crowley - completely non-functioning. Looks OK but no menu functionality and no way to log in to Zotero account.

This is such a great app for organizing journal papers and Pubmed searches. The ability to annotate articles from within Zotero and then extract those annotations is really great. 

Highly recommend this wonderful app. Many thanks to the creators.

The app itself is great - I have been using the desktop version directly from the Zotero website for some time now. However, the flatpak is not useful for me. The folder where I keep my research papers is in a different partition and it's not easy to figure out how to access that from the flatpak version. (I don't yet use Zotero's file sync.) It seems to be creating its own virtual file system. I'll probably need to study up about flatpak to use this correctly.

I wish there was a way to use personal cloud, or even Google Drive. Perhaps the storage built in is to subsidize the product?

Personally, I'd prefer the donation route, to get that feature as a 'Pro' option maybe via Patreon or? Just a suggestion ...
summary: I'm Happy With It - Have Suggestion Tho

description: Don't know how people write academically without it!
I can't cite anything I tried to add it to Write in LibreOffice and I don't have that option.
cannot change pdf-viewer, it refers to sanbox file system that does not include e.g. okular.... so it makes package unusable...
I a delighted with how great Zoter is for organizing and syncing my research library across my devices. It works great for me!
probably one of the most useful apps for researchers. No problem with the installation.

I have used Bookends, Mendeley, Refworks, and now Zotero (I even had the mad notion to try JabRef for about an hour - that's hard work!).
However, out of all those Zotero is the solution I keep returning to.
It is not perfect, and it *really* needs to be able to adopt a dark mode along with the host OS.
Nonetheless, with a few really good plug-ins, some really cool features in-built and the reasonably-priced cloud accompaniment service ...
Zotero is far and away the leader in the world of reference management, if one is not willing to re-mortgage their home to maintain an active license.
Highly recommended.
the only thing I don't like is that html pages need to be opened in a browser but aside from that the app works great and additional functionallity can be added on to it through its add ons

Installation in one click, updates automatically.
Synchronize well with both Zotero and webdav.
summary: I am happy it is on Flatpack

description: Great app, hope it will add more functionality in the future, it's too bare bones in my opinion.
Not facing any crashes by now
Working as expected. Doesn't integrate to the system, though (GNOME here, on openSUSE); you have to launch it through a terminal.
summary: Works fine, but no system integration

description: I really love using zotero. The sync account (together with WebDAV) is very useful for multiple platforms.
Functionality-wise, it's awesome (syncing, exporting info, adding resources, etc.).
summary: Syncing, exporting info, adding resources, etc. all work great

description: I have used Zotero for many years to keep track of papers I read. The ability to add papers through a plugin to the browser makes that part trivial. The locally stored PDFs can then be marked up with comments and questions. Ability to use an external WebDAV server for keeping the papers is also great.
summary: Fantastic for keeping track of literature

description: Today I could do everything with this app that I wanted to do, it threw no errors and has been a smooth set-up.
Works perfect with all of the Linux Distros I have worked with unlike Mendeley.

It allows you to manage references. It's a must have for writing thesis, articles and papers. 
Nice integration with Latex and other writing software. 

I've seen many people who use online resources such as "chionmachine" to obtain references, but often the results are incomplete and lead to incorrect quotes. With Zotero you can be safe. It will be just right.

Phenomenal software for citations, annotations and bibliographies. Had to manually install the extension into LibreOffice which might be a turn off for users who just want it to work out of the box. The Firefox extension works great.
It would be even better if they supported some kind of dark mode when reading pdfs!

This Software is simply amazing! It allos to simply enter ISBNs and downloads Metadata to a publication without any fuzz.
Afterwards it can be exported into the typical biblatex format.
It became a substantial part of my Latex-Workflow. Total recommendation!
summary: Amazing Software, prefect for biblatex referencing

description: Extremely helpful in multiple thesis and essays
summary: Extremely helpful in multiple thesis and essays

description: After it took me some time to set everything up and get used to Zotero became quickly one of the applications I use most. Massive time-saver, but automating my Citations also reduces the amount of small mistakes I would make doing everything myself.
summary: One of my most essential applications

description: Wenn man im Studium schriftliche Ausarbeitungen anfertigt und hierbei gar systematische Literaturrecherchen durchführt, ist dieses Programm eine gute Hilfe, um die ganzen Quellen im Blick zu behalten.

Zotero te permite organizar cantidades enormes de información documental. Puedes agregar registros de libros, artículos, videos, entrevistas, páginas web, etc. y agregar notas, archivos adjuntos, etiquetas, así como conectarlo con Firefox u otro navegador y con tu procesador de textos favorito para facilitar la creación de bibliografías.
Great alternative to EndNote
excelente para gestionar bibliografía
Y no solamente porque funcione en Linux, sino porque es extremadamente versatil y tiene una serie de Plugins que te hace la vida (y la investigación) mucho más agradable. Recomendadisimo.
summary: Por encima de cualquier otro gestor bibliográfico

description: It is an essential app to manage a bibliography. It works great.
Công cụ cần có cho học tập và nghiên cứu.

Intégré à Writer, Zotero est très utile.
Simple, rapide... Que dire de plus ?
Impératif si vous suivez un cursus universitaire.

Si vous avez êtes amenés à gérer des références bibliographiques, issues de libres, d'articles, de pages web ou n'importe quoi, pour faire des citations dans vos documents ... N'hésitez pas, Zotero est fait pour vous.

Rien à redire, cette version fonctionne aussi bien que celle pouvant être téléchargée sur le site web de l'application. En bonus, on a un lanceur déjà prêt à être utilisé sans commandes supplémentaires. Également, pour critiquer Zotero, il s'agit d'un excellent outil pour gérer sa bibliographie, surtout dans un contexte de travail d'équipe.

C'est une app disponible sur tous les OS, desktop comme mobile, idéal si vous travaillez sur des machines équipées d'autres OS. C'est également très bien intégré à Firefox. Ne cherchez plus, c'est l'application de gestion de bibliographie qu'il vous faut !
При написании работ, где в итоге потребуется составлять библиографический список - суперприложение! Есть связка с браузером и либре офисом.

Отличное приложение для работы с библиографией! Незаменимый инструмент для написания статей, курсовых, дипломных работ и диссертаций. Имеет плагины для работы с браузером, Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer и Google Doc.
summary: Рекомендую всем, кто работает с литературой!
